# alicloud\_caller\_identity

This data source provides the identity of the current user.

-> **NOTE:** Available in 1.65.0+.

## Example Usage

```python
import constructs as constructs
import cdktf as cdktf
# Provider bindings are generated by running cdktf get.
# See https://cdk.tf/provider-generation for more details.
import ...gen.providers.alicloud as alicloud
class MyConvertedCode(cdktf.TerraformStack):
    def __init__(self, scope, name):
        super().__init__(scope, name)
        data_alicloud_caller_identity_current =
        alicloud.data_alicloud_caller_identity.DataAlicloudCallerIdentity(self, "current")
        cdktf.TerraformOutput(self, "current_user_arn",
            value=data_alicloud_caller_identity_current.id
        )
```

## Attributes Reference

The following attributes are exported:

* `id` - Principal ID.
* `arn` - The Alibaba Cloud Resource Name (ARN) of the user making the call.
* `account_id` - Account ID.
* `identity_type` - The type of the princiapal. RAMUser for users.
